ai-pp2.2:1.1_0: And who is the person with anger?
ai-pp2.2:1.3_0: The irritable, hostile, displaying anger, deceit, flattering, fraud, pliable, workable, and radiant mind.
ai-pp2.2:1.5_0: Whoever has not given up anger,
ai-pp2.2:1.6_0: This is called a person with wealthy.
ai-pp2.2:2.4_0: such as anger, enmity, contempt, doing, lingering, and repulsion.
ai-pp2.2:2.5_0: This is called the hostile person.
ai-pp2.2:2.6_0: Whoever hasn’t given up this person,
ai-pp2.2:2.7_0: This is called a person with a partner.
ai-pp2.2:3.1_0: And who is the personal of Makkhali?
ai-pp2.2:3.3_0: The actions of Makkhali is finished.
ai-pp2.2:3.5_0: Whoever hasn’t given up this person,
ai-pp2.2:4.1_0: And who is the person bright?
ai-pp2.2:4.3_0: It’s not possible that a feverish contempt is obstinately sticking to it, holding it up, and letting it go,
ai-pp2.2:4.5_0: The person who hasn’t given up this person,
ai-pp2.2:4.6_0: This is called a person who is wise.
ai-pp2.2:5.1_0: And who is the person jealousy?
ai-pp2.2:5.3_0: The gaining honor for others, resenting, and begrudging the possessions, honor, respect, reverence, homage, and veneration given to others.
ai-pp2.2:5.5_0: Whoever hasn’t given up this person,
ai-pp2.2:5.6_0: This is called a person with corruption.
ai-pp2.2:6.4_0: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teachings.
ai-pp2.2:6.5_0: Such fishing dealings are indeed, trapped in a fish-net,
ai-pp2.2:6.6_0: This is called accomplishment in view.
ai-pp2.2:6.7_0: Whoever hasn’t given up this person
ai-pp2.2:6.8_0: This is called a person who is stingy.
ai-pp2.2:7.1_0: And who is the person with a wretch?
ai-pp2.2:7.3_0: It may be that someone is devious and deceitful.
ai-pp2.2:7.4_0: In regard to this, whatever can be crossed over, the edge of cross-legged in the ground, the far shore is used.
ai-pp2.2:7.6_0: For the person who hasn’t given up this person,
ai-pp2.2:7.7_0: This is called a person who is removed in dirty.
ai-pp2.2:8.1_0: And what person is a person’s deceitful?
ai-pp2.2:8.3_0: It’s when someone does bad things by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-pp2.2:8.4_0: “Don’t wish,” “Don’t wish,” “May they know me as Joti!” But when you know me, “Kimba!”
ai-pp2.2:8.5_0: Such things as a mother, a child, annoying, flattering, singing, and preventing. They cover themselves with garlands, fragrance, and makeup.
ai-pp2.2:8.7_0: Whoever hasn’t given up Māra’s level,
ai-pp2.2:8.8_0: This is called a person with a twice.
ai-pp2.2:9.1_0: And who is the person without a conscience?
ai-pp2.2:9.3_0: They don’t have any bad, unskillful qualities.
ai-pp2.2:9.5_0: Because of this person he possesses this conscience.
ai-pp2.2:10.1_0: And what person is not prudent?
ai-pp2.2:10.3_0: They don’t prudent when it comes to acquire conscience and prudence, and bad, unskillful qualities are found in me:
ai-pp2.2:10.5_0: This person has no conscience and prudence.
ai-pp2.2:11.1_0: And who is the person who hard to admonish?
ai-pp2.2:11.3_0: one who is Dhammadinnā is being taught in accordance with the rule, being taught to the ignorant, of hate, and delusion, and of the noble ones.
ai-pp2.2:11.4_0: This is called being hard to admonish.
ai-pp2.2:11.5_0: endowed with this person who has these qualities, (and say): “This person is easy to admonish,”
ai-pp2.2:12.3_0: Those who are faithless, unvirtuous, witless, and witless. Abstaining from eating at settlements, food, drink, clothes, and beds and chairs.
ai-pp2.2:12.5_0: By this bad friendship, “I have wicked friends.”
ai-pp2.2:13.1_0: And what person doesn’t guard the sense doors?
ai-pp2.2:13.2_0: Herein, what is sense doors guarded?
ai-pp2.2:13.3_0: When a person sees a sight with their eyes, they get caught up in the features and details.
ai-pp2.2:13.4_0: Since the faculty of sight is left unrestrained, bad unskillful qualities of desire and aversion become overwhelming. They don’t practice restraint, they don’t protect the faculty of sight, and they don’t achieve its restraint.
ai-pp2.2:13.5_0: Hearing a sound with the ears ...
ai-pp2.2:13.6_0: When they smell an odor with their nose ...
ai-pp2.2:13.7_0: Tasting a flavor with the tongue ...
ai-pp2.2:13.8_0: When we feel a touch with our body ...
ai-pp2.2:13.9_0: When they know a thought with their mind, they get caught up in the features and details.
ai-pp2.2:13.10_0: Since the faculty of mind is left unrestrained, bad unskillful qualities of desire and aversion become overwhelming. They don’t practice restraint, they don’t protect the faculty of mind, and they don’t achieve its restraint.
ai-pp2.2:13.11_0: The faculty of these six faculties is not guarded and criticized,
ai-pp2.2:13.12_0: This is called the guarding of the sense doors.
ai-pp2.2:13.13_0: When they have these sense doors, they are restrained.
ai-pp2.2:14.1_0: And what person knows the deathless?
ai-pp2.2:14.2_0: Herein, what is not suitable in eating?
ai-pp2.2:14.3_0: It’s when someone doesn’t eat food, drink, clothes, vehicles, or the stain of stinginess.
ai-pp2.2:14.4_0: This is said to be not eating in moderation.
ai-pp2.2:14.5_0: When a person has these kinds of food in moderation, they know that it is the wrong way.
ai-pp2.2:15.1_0: And who is a person who has lost mindfulness?
ai-pp2.2:15.2_0: Herein, what is the truth that is unmindful?
ai-pp2.2:15.3_0: And the recollection of non-greed is not discontent, fondness will be able to come.
ai-pp2.2:15.4_0: This is called the truth of the unmindful.
ai-pp2.2:15.5_0: for this person who is forgetful, endowed with for themselves.
ai-pp2.2:16.1_0: And who is a person uncleared in wisdom?
ai-pp2.2:16.2_0: Herein, what is mindfulness and situational awareness?
ai-pp2.2:16.3_0: Whatever is not knowing and not seeing, the underlying tendencies of ignorance is not penetrated, unbroken, impeccable, spotless, and unmarred ignorant. Delusion is ignorance and unprofitable, ignorance. Delusion is their root, and ignorance. Delusion is unprofitable, ignorance. Delusion is their root, and ignorance.
ai-pp2.2:16.5_0: A person who has no situational awareness of calming up is endowed with no situational awareness.
ai-pp2.2:17.1_0: And who is the person accomplished in ethics?
ai-pp2.2:17.2_0: Herein, what is failure in ethics?
ai-pp2.2:17.3_0: Bodily transgression, verbal transgression, and verbal transgression—
ai-pp2.2:17.5_0: All the virtuous are poor in virtue.
ai-pp2.2:17.6_0: endowed with virtue: “This person has attained perfection in virtue”,
ai-pp2.2:18.1_0: And what person is reborn in view?
ai-pp2.2:18.2_0: Herein, what is failure in view?
ai-pp2.2:18.3_0: “There’s no meaning in giving, sacrifice, or offerings. There’s no fruit or result of good and bad deeds. There’s no afterlife. There’s no obligation to mother and father. No beings are reborn spontaneously. And there’s no ascetic or brahmin who is well attained and practiced, and who describes the afterlife after realizing it with their own insight.”
ai-pp2.2:18.4_0: the view of such views, the recipients of views, the opposite of the views, the recipients of views, the recipients, the opposites, the sense fields, and the wrong view. This is called the wrong path.
ai-pp2.2:18.6_0: endowed with this view, “By what a person has the view that is wrong,”
ai-pp2.2:19.1_0: And who is the person fettered internally?
ai-pp2.2:19.2_0: Whoever hasn’t given up the five lower fetters:
ai-pp2.2:19.3_0: This is called a person who is fettered internally.
ai-pp2.2:20.1_0: And who is the person who is fettered externally?
ai-pp2.2:20.2_0: Whoever hasn’t given up the five higher fetters:
ai-pp2.2:20.3_0: This is called a person who is fettered.
ai-pp2.2:21.1_0: And who is the person here without anger?
ai-pp2.2:21.3_0: The irritable, hostile, displaying anger, deceit, flattering, fraud, pliable, workable, and radiant mind.
ai-pp2.2:21.5_0: The person who has given up anger,
ai-pp2.2:21.6_0: This is called a person with wealthy.
ai-pp2.2:22.1_0: And what person is because they don’t inferior?
ai-pp2.2:22.3_0: Some time irritable, studying, commoning, irritability, hostility, disdain, contempt, jealousy, stinginess, deviousness, obstinacy, rolling the conceit ‘I am’.
ai-pp2.2:22.4_0: This is called the hostile person.
ai-pp2.2:22.5_0: Whoever has given up this person,
ai-pp2.2:22.6_0: This is called a person who has committed an offense.
ai-pp2.2:23.1_0: And what person is a personal witness?
ai-pp2.2:23.3_0: The actions of Makkhali is finished.
ai-pp2.2:23.5_0: Whoever has given up the conceit ‘I am’ and
ai-pp2.2:23.6_0: This is called a person who has committed an offense.
ai-pp2.2:24.1_0: And who is the person who is like a lump of fat?
ai-pp2.2:24.3_0: It’s not possible that a feverish contempt is obstinately sticking to it, holding it up, and letting it go,
ai-pp2.2:24.5_0: The individual who has given up this individual essence,
ai-pp2.2:24.6_0: This is called a person with specific purpose.
ai-pp2.2:25.1_0: And who is the person without jealousy?
ai-pp2.2:25.3_0: The gaining honor for others, resenting, and begrudging the possessions, honor, respect, reverence, homage, and veneration given to others.
ai-pp2.2:25.5_0: Whoever has given up the jealousy,
ai-pp2.2:25.6_0: This is called a person who is free of oppressive.
ai-pp2.2:26.4_0: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teachings.
ai-pp2.2:26.5_0: Such fishing dealings are indeed, trapped in a fish-net,
ai-pp2.2:26.6_0: This is called accomplishment in view.
ai-pp2.2:26.7_0: Whoever has given up this person
ai-pp2.2:26.8_0: This is called a person who has stingy.
ai-pp2.2:27.1_0: And who is the person who is not devious or deceitful?
ai-pp2.2:27.3_0: It may be that someone is devious and deceitful.
ai-pp2.2:27.4_0: In regard to this, whatever can be crossed over, the edge of cross-legged in the ground, the far shore is used.
ai-pp2.2:27.6_0: For he who has given up this person,
ai-pp2.2:27.7_0: This is called a person who has removed it.
ai-pp2.2:28.1_0: And what person is said to be honest?
ai-pp2.2:28.3_0: It’s when someone does bad things by way of body, speech, and mind, and these things deprived by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-pp2.2:28.4_0: “Don’t wish,” “Don’t wish,” “May they know me as Joti!” But when you know me, “Kimba!”
ai-pp2.2:28.5_0: Such things as a mother, a child, annoying, flattering, singing, and preventing. They cover themselves with garlands, fragrance, and makeup.
ai-pp2.2:28.7_0: But the person who has given up Māra
ai-pp2.2:28.8_0: This is called a person who is said to be the best.
ai-pp2.2:29.1_0: And what person is a person like a rising person?
ai-pp2.2:29.2_0: Herein, what is constant in groups?
ai-pp2.2:29.3_0: When there is conscience and prudence, bad unskillful qualities are given up by undertaking and directions,
ai-pp2.2:29.5_0: Because of this person to say, “By this person,”
ai-pp2.2:30.2_0: Herein, what is conscience and shame?
ai-pp2.2:30.3_0: They’re prudent and prudent when it comes to acquiring any bad, unskillful qualities.
ai-pp2.2:30.5_0: This person is endowed with conscience and shame.
ai-pp2.2:31.1_0: And who is the person easy to admonish?
ai-pp2.2:31.3_0: Understanding the teaching of the noble ones, they are unrestrained, without quarreling, blending like milk and water, and regarding the noble ones.
ai-pp2.2:31.5_0: By this person who possesses it, (thinking): “This person is easy to admonish,”
ai-pp2.2:32.2_0: Herein, what is accomplishment in good friendship?
ai-pp2.2:32.3_0: Those who are faithful, ethical, educated, advocating, wise, and learned, living in dependence on generosity, a husband who is wise, living in the next life, a meal abstaining from eating at settles, and in checking the meals.
ai-pp2.2:32.4_0: This is called accomplishment in good friendship.
ai-pp2.2:32.5_0: Good friendship is that very good friendship.
ai-pp2.2:33.1_0: And what person guards the sense doors?
ai-pp2.2:33.3_0: When a person sees a sight with their eyes, they don’t get caught up in the features and details.
ai-pp2.2:33.4_0: If the faculty of sight were left unrestrained, bad unskillful qualities of desire and aversion would become overwhelming. For this reason, he practices restraint, protecting the faculty of sight, and achieving restraint over it.
ai-pp2.2:33.5_0: Hearing a sound with the ears ...
ai-pp2.2:33.6_0: When they smell an odor with their nose ...
ai-pp2.2:33.7_0: Tasting a flavor with the tongue ...
ai-pp2.2:33.8_0: When we feel a touch with our body ...
ai-pp2.2:33.9_0: Knowing a thought with their mind, they don’t get caught up in the features and details.
ai-pp2.2:33.10_0: If the faculty of mind were left unrestrained, bad unskillful qualities of desire and aversion would become overwhelming. For this reason, he practices restraint, protecting the faculty of mind, and achieving restraint over it.
ai-pp2.2:33.11_0: Their sense faculties are guarded and restrained,
ai-pp2.2:33.12_0: This is called the sense doors.
ai-pp2.2:33.13_0: When they live with these sense doors, they are restrained.
ai-pp2.2:34.1_0: And who is the person who eats in moderation?
ai-pp2.2:34.2_0: Herein, what is eating in moderation?
ai-pp2.2:34.3_0: It’s when someone reflects properly on the food that they eat:
ai-pp2.2:34.4_0: “Not for sport, for showing off, not for ornament,
ai-pp2.2:34.5_0: but only to maintain this body, to avoid harming, and to support spiritual life.
ai-pp2.2:34.6_0: In this way, I shall put an end to old discomfort and not give rise to new discomfort, and I will live blamelessly and at ease.”
ai-pp2.2:34.7_0: In regard to this, whatever food he considers there are, he reflects:
ai-pp2.2:34.8_0: This is called eating in moderation.
ai-pp2.2:34.9_0: In this eating a person who has moderation in eating; endowed with food, is endowed with in moderation,
ai-pp2.2:36.1_0: And who is the person with mindfulness aware?
ai-pp2.2:36.3_0: wisdom, which is the aggregates, investigations of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, wisdom, and equanimity of allaying. They have accumulated the wisdom faculty with wisdom, the wisdom faculty, and wisdom. And wisdom, the wisdom of opposite of wisdom, the investigation of principles, wisdom, and right view.
ai-pp2.2:36.5_0: This person with situational awareness is endowed with situational awareness, “This person is reborn in (in knowledge).”
ai-pp2.2:37.1_0: And who is a person accomplished in ethics?
ai-pp2.2:37.2_0: Herein, what is accomplishment in ethics?
ai-pp2.2:37.3_0: Bodily non-transgression, verbal non-transgression, bodily and verbal non-transgression.
ai-pp2.2:37.4_0: This is called accomplishment in ethics.
ai-pp2.2:37.6_0: endowed with virtue, “This person is endowed with perfect conduct”,
ai-pp2.2:38.1_0: And what person is accomplished in view?
ai-pp2.2:38.2_0: Herein, what is accomplishment in view?
ai-pp2.2:38.3_0: “There is meaning in giving, sacrifice, and offerings. There are fruits and results of good and bad deeds. There is an afterlife. There is obligation to mother and father. There are beings reborn spontaneously. And there are ascetics and brahmins who are well attained and practiced, and who describe the afterlife after realizing it with their own insight.”
ai-pp2.2:38.5_0: This is called accomplishment in view.
ai-pp2.2:38.7_0: endowed with this view, “Possession with view,”
ai-pp2.2:39.1_0: What two people are rare in the world?
ai-pp2.2:39.2_0: One who knows the right time, one who knows what is right and what is right,
ai-pp2.2:39.3_0: These are the two people who are rare in the world.
ai-pp2.2:40.1_0: What two people are hard to satisfy in the world?
ai-pp2.2:40.2_0: One who continually hoards wealth, and one who continually wastes wealth.
ai-pp2.2:40.3_0: These are the two people who are supreme in the world.
ai-pp2.2:41.1_0: What two persons are easy to satisfy in the world?
ai-pp2.2:41.2_0: One who continually hoards wealth, and one who continually wastes wealth.
ai-pp2.2:41.3_0: These are the two people who are restrained.
ai-pp2.2:42.2_0: One who is remorseful over something they shouldn’t be, and one who isn’t remorseful over something they should be.
ai-pp2.2:42.3_0: These are the two people who grow.
ai-pp2.2:43.2_0: One who is remorseful over something they shouldn’t be, and one who isn’t remorseful over something they should be.
ai-pp2.2:43.3_0: These are the two people who don’t grow.
ai-pp2.2:44.1_0: And what person is inferior in terms of inferiority?
ai-pp2.2:44.2_0: It’s when a person is unethical, of bad character, and associates with bad people.
ai-pp2.2:44.3_0: This is called a person who is committed to the lesser life.
ai-pp2.2:45.1_0: And what person is committed to the superior states?
ai-pp2.2:45.2_0: It’s someone who is ethical, of good character, and who associates with good friends, companions, and associates with them.
ai-pp2.2:45.3_0: This is called a personal wounds.
ai-pp2.2:46.2_0: those Independent Buddhas, those who are Worthy Ones,
